snippet: Russia blamed radiation on Tuesday for a computer glitch that doomed its mission to a moon of Mars, but space industry experts cast doubt on the findings.
abstract: Russian officials blame radiation for a computer glitch that doomed its Phobos-Grunt mission to a Mars moon, but space industry experts cast doubt on their findings.
lead_paragraph: Russia blamed radiation on Tuesday for a computer glitch that doomed its mission to a moon of Mars, but space industry experts cast doubt on the findings.

headline.main: Russia: Radiation Blamed in Doomed Space Mission
headline.print_headline: Russia: Radiation Blamed in Doomed Space Mission
